fields.name: Mouse's Favourite
fields.description: Simply the best handcrafted cashew cheeses, including the original vegan camembert!

fields.name: Honestly Tasty
fields.description: Artisan vegan nut cheeses - their vegan 'bree' and blue cheeses are out of this world!

fields.name: Sgaia
fields.description: Being a small business based in Scotland, Sgaia began due to a desire to recreate the national treasure of the Lorne sausage, only this time it would be vegan! Hand-making each and every product and using only the highest-quality ingredients, Sgaia’s vegan meat alternatives are fresh, flavoursome and extremely versatile – ideal for breakfast, lunch and dinner!

fields.name: Suma
fields.description: Check out the wonderful product range from Suma, the much-loved vegetarian co-operative from Yorkshire

fields.name: LoveRaw
fields.description: LoveRaw are on a mission to bring you awesome vegan chocolate, not only for vegans but for unvegan vegans too. Using superior ingredients and without compromising on taste.

fields.name: Proper
fields.description: All crunch, all flavour, no compromise.

fields.name: Ten Acre
fields.description: Welcome to the world of Ten Acre, where fabulous flavours tempt your taste-buds with hand-cooked crunchy crisps and scrumptious popcorn.

fields.name: Vego
fields.description: Fantastic creamy hazelnut chocolate joy. For the perfect pick-me-up.

fields.name: Free & Easy
fields.description: Free & Easy are dedicated to making the most delicious, healthy meals that everyone can enjoy.

fields.name: H!P Happiness in Plants
fields.description: H!P Oat Milk Chocolate is a sustainable, plant-based chocolate brand producing deliciously creamy chocolate from the best, ethically-sourced cocoa.

fields.name: Kinda Co
fields.description: Deliciously organic dairy-free cheese, handmade in Somerset. 100% plant-based using only natural ingredients.

fields.name: Mr Organic
fields.description: Delicious Italian-inspired pasta, pasta sauces, breadsticks and more! And guess what... they're all organic too.

fields.name: VBites
fields.description: Iconic UK-based vegan food producer with a wide range of vegan meat and cheese alternatives

fields.name: THIS
fields.description: THIS was created by two ex-burger chain founders who used their in-depth knowledge and love of meat to replicate it in texture, appearance and taste.

fields.name: Bio-D
fields.description: Bio-D make vegan, animal-free cleaning products that are effective, ethical, and don’t cost the earth. Cleaning without Compromise.
